remarks: The subspace sum of two isomorphisms of lattice elements is less than the isomorphism of their lattice join.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dihsumssj.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihsumssj.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihsumssj.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihsumssj.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsumssj.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihsumssj.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsumssj.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihsumssj.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
dihsumssj.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
dihsumssj $p |- ( ph -> ( ( I ` X ) .(+) ( I ` Y ) ) C_ ( I ` ( X .\/ Y ) ) ) $.
